reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-crafted and appreciate its classic black style, with one noting its versatility for different occasions.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it but it runs a tiny bit small
items.body: This is everything I was looking for in a classy black dress that would be suitable for somber or conservative occasions. It's perfect for a funeral or meeting the Pope. I think 3/4 sleeves are universally flattering, and the midi length is quite elegant. The notched neckline is flanked by two little pleats that add dimension and interest. The fabric has some stretch but isn't clingy. It is forgiving of any lumps or bumps you may have. If you are short waisted, the inset waist seam should be just right for you. Us long waisted gals are used to having the waist seam ride up on our bottom ribs. I always try to hide that with a stretchy belt. The side zipper is a bit of challenge to navigate, especially through the bulkier waist seam area, but it is manageable. I'm 5' 6'' and about 125 lb. I usually wear an extra small in dresses but found this XS to be just a bit too tight in the bodice and the upper arms. I ordered the small and it's a perfect fit. I think this is going to be a wardrobe workhorse and for a fantastic price. I've ordered a couple more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Theresa D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: Fits beautifully and the fabric lays nicely! I purchased the dress for a funeral, but will wear it often. Read more
items.author: Terri OBrien

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Substantial, well-fitting dress for business, evening or travel
items.body: This is a substantial, well-fitting dress. The style is attractive and can be worn alone or dressed up. The fabric is heavier and I would suggest it's more of a fall/winter dress. It washed well and is nearly wrinkle free from hanging to dry; it would travel well. Read more
items.author: Penny Anast

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is worthwhile & looked good
items.body: the large fit well. fabric was a little "heavy" but it is a winter dress for me. stretchy & easy to get on. A little difficult to get the packing wrinkles out worrying about melting the fabric. Read more
items.author: Linda pinda

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color
items.body: Very nice, comfortable, but the size does not correspond to the guide, it was very small. Read more
items.author: Doctora Corazón

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very Poor Quality and Construction
items.body: I wasn’t expecting luxury at this price point, so in that sense, you get what you pay for. The dress looked cute in the photo, but in person, the material felt cheap and the fit was very boxy (kind of like a potato sack). It might work as a super casual piece, but it didn’t quite work for me. Read more
items.author: E. Wiechering

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommended.
items.body: So happy with this dress. I typically wear a size 2 in a dress and the XS fit me perfectly. The material is a medium weight crepe polyester (with 5% spandex that does not provide stretch - but that was not problem for me). The dress hangs very well and on me (5'4" / 29.5" inseam), the hem hit about two inches below my knee. It arrives folded in plastic bag so you will need to iron or steam out some wrinkles before wearing. I used a steamer and the wrinkles were easy to release. I bought this for a Fall funeral because it's understated. But, it can be easily dressed up for a party or date. Nice size side pockets too. Read more
items.author: Bea

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too tight
items.body: Very nice dress but the bust & midriff is very tight & small Read more
items.author: BH

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Tan, Brown, Dark Khaki, Purple Grey, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Hot Pink, Black, Deep Apricot, Navy Blue, Gray Blue, Dark Brown, Dark Green, Light Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
